{{cpp/experimental/ranges/title|UnsignedIntegral}}
{{cpp/experimental/ranges/concepts/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=experimental/ranges/concepts|since=ranges|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept bool UnsignedIntegral = Integral&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; !SignedIntegral&lt;T&gt;;
}}

The concept {{tt|UnsignedIntegral&lt;T&gt;}} is satisfied if and only if {{tt|T}} is an integral type and {{c|std::is_signed&lt;T&gt;::value}} is {{c|false}}.

===Notes===
{{tt|UnsignedIntegral&lt;T&gt;}} may be satisfied by a type that is not a [[cpp/language/type#Type classification|unsigned integer type]], for example, {{c|bool}}.
